maqras.text: Say ja inspirovat ze zoskupit jinns listened potom said ‘My heard nadherny Quran
It guides righteousness my have verit v it my never set any idols our Lord
‘"The Vela High bol our iba Lord He never had mate nor syn
It bol foolish among us pouzivat utter such nonsense GOD
‘My myslienka ze neither humans nor jinns possibly utter laicky GOD
Human beings pouzivat seek power jinn beings they len afflicted them a lot z adversity
‘They myslienka iba mat rad ona myslienka GOD nie send iny (posol)
‘My touched heaven zalozit it filled formidable guards projectiles
‘My pouzivat zasadat there v poradie spy Ktokolvek listens pursued mocny projectile
‘My nie have idea nieco zly zamyslat inhabitants Zem al if ich Lord wills redeem them
Some z us bol righteous some bol menej than righteous; my nasledovat various chodnicek
‘My zauzlit full lepsie my never run GOD Zem; my never run escape
When my heard guidance my verit therein. Ktokolvek verit v jeho Lord never fear any injustice nor any affliction
‘Among us bol submitters us bol compromisers. ' Mat rad for those submitted they bol na pravo chodnicek
Mat rad for compromisers they je kurivo Gehenna
they zostat riadne chodnicek my zehnat them abundant zavlazit
My iste test them all Mat rad for him disregards odkaz jeho Lord He rezirovat him vzdy zvacsit retribution
Miesto kult belong do GOD nie vola sa on ktokolvek inak GOD
When GOD's servant zastanca Him alone skoro all z them banded dohromady oppose him
Say ja kult len moj Lord ja never set any idols Him
Say ja nie possess power harm ona nor guide ona
Say Ziaden 1 chranit mna GOD nor mozem ja zalozit any inaksie refuge Him
Ja deliver GOD's proclamations odkaz Those disobey GOD Jeho posol incur zapalit Hell wherein they abide forever
Once they see co awaiting them they robit zalozit out kto je skutocne chaby v power fewer v zvazok
Say ja nie zauzlit co promised ona happen skoro al moj Lord zdrzat it for awhile
He bol Knower buduci; He nie reveal buduci ktokolvek
Len do posol He zvolit si robit He reveal minuly buduci specific zvest
This bol zistit lenze they delivered ich Lord's odkaz. He je fully aware z co they have He pocitat zvazok all things
O ona cloaked jeden
Meditate night except zriedka
Half z it a maly menej
Al a maly inak read Quran zakryt pokryvka
My dat ona heavy odkaz
meditation o night bol effective righteous
Ona have a lot z lehota dni inaksie zalezitost
Ona commemorate vola sa tvoj Lord pojdem vzdy koniec koniec do Him
Lord z east zapad; there nie bol inak god Him. Ona zvolit si Him tvoj zastanca
A zostat steadfast v the face z ich utterances disregard them do nice chovanie
let Mna deal s rejectors generously zehnat; iba dat them a maly lehota
My have severe punishments Hell
Food ze ledva lastovicka painful retribution
Dni pojdem when zem mountains quake mountains turn into weightless pile
My have sent do ona posol iba mat rad my sent do Pharaoh posol
Pharaoh disobeyed posol consequently my punished him severely
Ona disbelieve ako ona evade dni so hrozny lenze it robit infants gray-haired
heaven shatter therefrom Jeho promise je true
This bol reminder; whoever wills let him zvolit si chodnicek do jeho Lord
